channel.title: Donator Promote Ticket (317)
channel.description: I need help adding a donator ticket. it promotes you to a donator. how would i make it write in config donators and donator = 1; and make that person log off and make it vanish? and where would i put it? i'm thinking it would go in clickingmost. BTW i have theticket inside already the first option is promote

item.title: Donator Promote Ticket (317)
item.dc:creator: @Vodzila Vodzila
item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

i manage to make to make you donator but it doesn’t delete and send the message i want it to send
when you have it and log off it makes you donator i added
c.logoff();
and
c.donator = 1;

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Promote Ticket (317)
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

if (playerHasItem(ID)) {
donator = 1;
}
under public void logout put
deleteItem(ID);

note the ID means the item id. And if this doesnt work post errors.

EDIT: do you want the player to still have donator status after he/she logs out?

Read full topic
